title: Reinstall gets all the way to 76% but just stops.
body: I had to reinstall  because the last client just wouldn't launch. It gets up to 76% easily but after that it just says "applying patches..." and is justs stuck on 76%. This is really annoying me since I had just put 20$ into the game. Please Help.

replies.body:
Issues at any stage past 33% in patching are usually caused by an *unstable connection* to the patching servers. This is typically a result of conflicting network settings, so I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure that's not the case. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
